meanings.definition: A vacuole in the cytoplasm of a cell, containing a phagocytosed particle enclosed within a part of the cell membrane.
meanings.sent1: The phagosomes in the cell help to digest particles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists observed the phagosomes under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The phagosomes in the cell had a party with the particles they engulfed.
meanings.sent4: The phagosomes acted like tiny stomachs, breaking down the particles.
meanings.sent5: The phagosomes were like little containers of digestion inside the cell.
